title: Location for Water Sample in Acid Rain Study

content.prompt: Which of the following would be the best location to obtain a water sample from to determine if the paper plant is affecting the acidity of the river?

choices.label: Immediately downstream from the paper plant
Immediately upstream from the paper plant
At an upstream tributary to the river
At a downstream tributary to the river

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
